com.neovisionaries.android.database

Class CursorWaiter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.DataSetObserver
      • com.neovisionaries.android.database.CursorWaiter

  • public class CursorWaiter
extends android.database.DataSetObserver
    Utility to wait for a cursor to retrieve data. 
     Cursor cursor = ...;

 // Wait for the cursor to retrieve data. 
 new CursorWaiter(cursor).join();
    Since:
    1.3
    Author:
    Takahiko Kawasaki

    • Method Detail

      • join

        public boolean join()
        Wait for the cursor to retrieve data.
        Returns:
        True if the cursor finished data retrieval. False if the internal thread was interrupted for some reasons.

        public void onChanged()
